title: Grid-connected non-networking micro-grid system and control protection method thereof
assignees: Guodian United Power Technology Co Ltd

events.title: Application filed by Guodian United Power Technology Co Ltd
events.assignee_search: Guodian United Power Technology Co Ltd

abstract: The invention discloses a grid-connected non-networking micro-grid system and a control protection method thereof. On the premise of basically not changing the structure of the original power distribution system, multiple types of distributed power sources, such as wind power generation system, photovoltaic power generation system, cell accumulation system and the like, are connected into a common power grid along with user loads through AC buses, and reasonable load layout and active energy management are utilized to implement grid-connected non-networking of the micro-grid system. By using the structural design and the active energy management of the micro-grid central control unit, the new energy power generation system can be completely self-sufficient, and does not reversely transmit power to the common power grid, thereby avoiding impacting the normal power supply of the common power grid; and meanwhile, by the aid of the common power grid, the user loads have higher power supply reliability and electric power quality.
claims: 2. the microgrid system that do not surf the Net that is incorporated into the power networks according to claim 1 is characterized in that said distributed generation system comprises wind generator system, photovoltaic generating system; Said distributed energy-storage system comprises battery energy storage system.

3. the microgrid system that do not surf the Net that is incorporated into the power networks according to claim 1 is characterized in that said user load comprises load on the spot and conventional load;
      Said load on the spot realizes the quick switching between itself and public electric wire net and this duplex feeding system of little electrical network through convertible static switch.

4. according to each described microgrid system that do not surf the Net that is incorporated into the power networks of claim 1-3, it is characterized in that, be provided with the reverse power protection device at the points of common connection place of said high-voltage alternating bus and public electric wire net.

5. according to each described microgrid system that do not surf the Net that is incorporated into the power networks of claim 1-3, it is characterized in that, also be provided with unidirectional electric power meter at the points of common connection place of said high-voltage alternating bus and public electric wire net.

6. the control guard method of microgrid system of not surfing the Net of being incorporated into the power networks is characterized in that, comprises the steps:
      (1) at first is the power ACTIVE CONTROL of distributed energy-storage system: totally load scale under the basic premise of distributed generation system generate output the user; Adopt the active adjustment function of distributed energy-storage system, can satisfy in most cases power folk prescription to flowing;
      (2) secondly be the limit power operation Passive Control of distributed generation system: when the distributed generation system generate output is totally loaded greater than the user; And when also being difficult to satisfy microgrid internal power balance through distributed energy-storage system charging absorption active power; Can limit the photovoltaic generation output in the distributed generation system earlier; Carry out the control of wind-powered electricity generation limit power again, under extreme case, even cut entirely; When customer charge increases, can divide into groups to drop into photovoltaic generating system and wind generator system.
      (3) be the inverse probability backup protection at last: the switching of under nominal situation, controlling discharging and recharging of distributed energy-storage system and distributed generation system apoplexy electric light volt system through the microgrid central controller is realized the internal power balance of whole microgrid system, guarantees that the power of points of common connection position flows to the microgrid system from public electric wire net all the time; Under the inefficacy of microgrid central controller or other abnormal conditions, through reverse power protection device preventing anti-power delivery.
